column5: Merry Christmas Bruce and all the best in the up and coming New year. Cheers Mitch
All the Best Bruce to you and your Lovely Family   Santa Looks a Lot Like You
Merry Christmas!!! Special one for us this year; got our first grandchild 3 months ago. She does't know whats going on; other then she loves all the attention. LOL Dan.
She sure is cute. Christmas will get real exciting next year.
Kalvin, that's not Bruce, thats Santa. I knew there was a real Santa. Merry Christmas guys and family
yes, indeed. Grandkids make Xmas special!! Have a good one, y'all!!
Merry Christmas everyone - hope you all enjoy some time off with friends and family.
Well Dave, I know there is a real Santa he just has to let me get back to fishing again. Got to try out those new lures he mad me last year... remember Santa
Merry Christmas Bruce Having some Pulla with coffee right now at the computer. All the best Mark
Merry Christmas to you & yours Bruce and have a great day.

With our growing family I had to bake 2 batches of pulla.  One batch done as sweet rolls. The grandkids like it Frenchie style, smothered in icing (yeecchh). Must get it from their 1/2 French mother. The second batch done as loaves on Christmas eve which we will have for breakfast tomorrow slathered in butter. One thing I'm not used to any more is getting up at 5 am with the grandkids bouncing off the walls.
